com.cyberneid.disigon.sdk

Class XAdESValidationData

  • java.lang.Object
    • xades4j.providers.ValidationData
      • com.cyberneid.disigon.sdk.XAdESValidationData

  • public class XAdESValidationData
extends xades4j.providers.ValidationData
    Container of validation data (certificates and corresponding CRLs).

    Contains the full certification chain, starting with the signing certificate and endind with the trust-anchor.

    Author:
    Lu√≠s
